DOC.brief_title: Anal Cytology Collection Procedures Predicting High-Grade Anal Dysplasia Men Who Have Sex With Men
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Evaluate sensitivity & specificity , predictive positive value ( PPV ) , & predictive negative value ( PNV ) ( test characteristic ) & cellularity , beta-globin , deoxyribonucleic acid ( DNA ) , ribonucleic acid ( RNA ) , & protein ( quality measure ) nylon-flocked ( NF ) - & Dacron-swab protocol detect biopsy-detected high-grade anal intraepithelial neoplasia ( HG-AIN ) & human papillomavirus ( HPV ) -infections , use randomized-controlled study design . II . Evaluate test characteristic anal cancer screen algorithms incorporate sequentially simultaneously perform high-threshold molecular HPV test , & without cytology , predict HG-AIN . III . Evaluate cost-effectiveness & relative cost single- & multiple-test anal cancer screen algorithm . OUTLINE : Patients undergo anal cytology collection use 2 NF swab 1 Dacron swab analysis via Papanicolaou ( Pap ) staining , HPV genotyping , polymerase chain reaction ( PCR ) .
